sentences.en: Did you have any contact with Seaman MacDonald?
sentences.cn: 你与水手麦克唐纳有什么接触 吗 ?

sentences.en: He expressed profound contempt for Ramsay MacDonald.
sentences.cn: 他对于麦克唐纳表示极端的蔑视.

sentences.en: How much money opens a MacDonald to need to invest?
sentences.cn: 开一家麦当劳需要投资多少钱?

sentences.en: If MacDonald does his job properly then this will be enforced.
sentences.cn: 如果麦克唐纳设计不出偏差的话,他的设计将被英航采用.

sentences.en: Macdonald accepted that such information could be used to manipulate, to obfuscate, and to mislead.
sentences.cn: 麦克唐纳相信这样的信息可以用来操纵舆论，蒙蔽误导。

sentences.en: Macdonald model, based on the Ross model, advanced the dynamics theory of malaria transmission.
sentences.cn: Macdonald模型 是在Ross模型的基础上提出的, 进一步发展了疟疾传播动力学理论.

sentences.en: MacDonald, J . Fred. Blacks and White TV. Chicago: Nelson - Hall, 1983.
sentences.cn: 《黑人与白人电视》. 芝加哥: 纳尔逊 - 霍尔出版社, 1983年版.

sentences.en: Oh really, but since when MacDonald have started selling Black Forest cake?
sentences.cn: 麦当劳的咖啡又贵又难喝, 但那里的黑森林蛋糕贵还是贵的有价值.

sentences.en: The land is rented to the village by Sir MacDonald.
sentences.cn: 这块地是麦克唐纳爵士租给村子里的.

sentences.en: Therefore our result was different from that of Macdonald.
sentences.cn: 此结果与Macdonald的报告差异较大.

sentences.en: They registered at the hotel under the name of macdonald.
sentences.cn: 他们以麦克唐纳(麦当劳)的名义在旅馆登记的.

sentences.en: They registered at the hotel under the name of Macdonald.
sentences.cn: 他们以麦当娜的名字登记住进该饭店.

sentences.en: Villa will be under MacDonald's charge against Stoke tonight.
sentences.cn: 维拉将会在今晚对斯托克城的比赛中继续由麦克唐纳执掌.

sentences.en: Vote MacDonald, the man you can trust!
sentences.cn: 请投麦克唐纳的票, 他是大家能信任的人!

trans.tran_cn: 麦当劳快餐店，麦克唐纳（姓氏）
